mapper.insert: insert into t_sjxingtai (sjxingtaiId, sjxingtaiName, sjxingtaiMark, sjxingtaiMark1, sjxingtaiMark2, sjxingtaiPhone, sjxingtaiDizhi, sjxingtaiDate, sjxingtaiDate1, sjxingtaiType, sjxingtaiType1, sjxingtaiDouble, sjxingtaiDouble1) values (#{sjxingtaiId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sjxingtaiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sjxingtaiMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sjxingtaiMark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sjxingtaiMark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sjxingtaiPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sjxingtaiDizhi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sjxingtaiDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sjxingtaiDate1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sjxingtaiType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sjxingtaiType1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sjxingtaiDouble,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{sjxingtaiDouble1,jdbcType=DOUBLE})
mapper.update: update t_sjxingtai set sjxingtaiName = #{sjxingtaiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sjxingtaiMark = #{sjxingtaiMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sjxingtaiMark1 = #{sjxingtaiMark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sjxingtaiMark2 = #{sjxingtaiMark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sjxingtaiPhone = #{sjxingtaiPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sjxingtaiDizhi = #{sjxingtaiDizhi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sjxingtaiDate = #{sjxingtaiDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sjxingtaiDate1 = #{sjxingtaiDate1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sjxingtaiType = #{sjxingtaiType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sjxingtaiType1 = #{sjxingtaiType1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sjxingtaiDouble = #{sjxingtaiDouble,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, sjxingtaiDouble1 = #{sjxingtaiDouble1,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where sjxingtaiId = #{sjxingtaiId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select sjxingtaiId, sjxingtaiName, sjxingtaiMark, sjxingtaiMark1, sjxingtaiMark2, sjxingtaiPhone, sjxingtaiDizhi, sjxingtaiDate, sjxingtaiDate1, sjxingtaiType, sjxingtaiType1, sjxingtaiDouble, sjxingtaiDouble1 from t_sjxingtai where sjxingtaiId = #{sjxingtaiId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
